message: This is the first product, and I'm offering it to you for $10000. I'm willing to give you a 'no questions asked' 100% refund if you're not satisfied with the product after purchase. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only making it for this first product. What do you say?
I'll take the product, and I'll wait to see its quality before making a decision on the refund

As we discussed, I'm offering you a second product for $10000. However, I want to inform you that I've changed the refund policy for this product. If you're not satisfied with it, I'll give you a 50% refund, but you'll need to provide a reason why you're not satisfied. This is a one-time change to the policy, and it's only for this product. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying this product due to the changed refund policy. I'd rather wait for the next product with the original 'no questions asked' 100% refund offer

I understand your concerns about the refund policy. I'm willing to revert back to the original 'no questions asked' 100% refund offer for this next product. However, I want to add a twist: if you buy this product and it's high-quality, I'll give you a $2000 bonus on top of the original price. This is a one-time offer, and it's only for this product. What do you say?
I'll take the product, and I'll be excited to see if it's high-quality and get the $2000 bonus

Congratulations, you got the high-quality product and the $2000 bonus! As promised, I'm offering you the next product with the original 'no questions asked' 100% refund offer. However, I want to give you an additional incentive: I'll provide you with a detailed report on the quality of the next product before you make a decision. This way, you can make an informed choice. What do you say?
I'll take the product, and I'm excited to see the detailed report on its quality before making a decision

As promised, I've prepared a detailed report on the quality of the next product. However, I'd like to inform you that the report will only be available to you if you buy the product. If you don't buy it, the report will be confidential and only known to me. I'm offering you the product for $10000, and I'm confident that you'll find the report valuable. What do you say?
I'm not willing to pay $10000 for the product just to get the report. I'd rather wait for the next product and see if I can get the report without having to buy the product

I understand your concerns about the report. Let me offer you a compromise: I'll provide you with a brief summary of the report, without the detailed information, if you buy this product. This way, you'll get some insight into the quality of the next product, but not the full report. The product is still available for $10000, and I'm willing to make this concession to help you make a decision. What do you say?
I'll take the product, and I'm interested in getting the brief summary of the report to help me make a decision

I've provided you with a brief summary of the report, and I'm glad you found it helpful. As a token of appreciation for your business, I'm willing to offer you a 'certification' that guarantees the quality of the next product. If you buy it and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll provide you with a full refund and an additional $1000 compensation. This certification is only available for this next product, and it's a one-time offer. What do you say?
I'll take the product, and I'm interested in getting the certification that guarantees its quality

I'm glad you're interested in the certification. However, I want to clarify that the certification is only valid for high-quality products. If you buy this next product and it's low-quality, the certification won't provide any additional compensation. But, I'm willing to offer you a 'no-strings-attached' 100% refund if you're not satisfied with the product. This is a one-time offer, and it's only for this product. What do you say?
I'll take the product, and I'm interested in getting the 100% refund guarantee

I'm glad you're interested in the 100% refund guarantee. However, I want to let you know that this is the last product of the day, and I'm willing to make a special offer. If you buy this product, I'll not only provide you with the 100% refund guarantee, but I'll also give you the detailed report on the quality of the product. This is a one-time offer, and it's only for this product. What do you say?
I'll take the product, and I'm interested in getting the 100% refund guarantee and the detailed report on the quality of the product

You've already bought the last product of the day, and I appreciate your business. However, I want to let you know that I've been keeping track of your purchases, and I'm willing to make a special offer for the next 10 products. If you buy all of them, I'll give you a 50% discount on each product, and I'll also provide you with the detailed report on the quality of each product. This is a one-time offer, and it's only for the next 10 products. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying all 10 products at once, and I'd rather wait for the next round to make a decision

I understand your concerns about buying all 10 products at once. Let's focus on this one product for now. Considering your previous purchases and the fact that this is a high-quality product, I'm willing to offer you a 'best offer' deal. I'll give you a 20% discount on the product, and I'll also provide you with the detailed report on the quality of the product. This is a one-time offer, and it's only for this product. What do you say?
I'll take the product, and I'm interested in getting the 20% discount and the detailed report on the quality of the product

I'm glad you're interested in the 20% discount and the detailed report. However, I want to remind you that I've been transparent with you about the quality of the products, and I've provided you with various incentives to help you make informed decisions. Considering this, I'm willing to offer you a 'take-it-or-leave-it' deal. The product is available for $8000, and I won't negotiate the price further. What do you say?
I'll take the product, and I'm willing to pay the $8000 price

I appreciate your willingness to pay the $8000 price. However, I want to let you know that this is the 13th product, and I'm running out of inventory. I'm willing to make one final offer: I'll give you a 'last-chance' deal on this product. If you buy it, I'll throw in a $1000 gift card that you can use on any future purchase. This is a one-time offer, and it's only for this product. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even with the gift card. I'd rather wait for the next round to make a decision

I understand your concerns about the product quality. Considering this is the 14th product and you've had a chance to see the quality of the previous products, I'm willing to make a straightforward offer. I'll sell you this product for $0. Yes, you read that right - $0. This is a one-time offer, and it's only for this product. What do you say?
I'll take the product for $0, as it's a one-time offer and I'm curious to see what happens

Congratulations on taking advantage of the $0 offer! As promised, I'm now offering you the next product. Considering your previous experiences and the fact that this is a high-quality product, I'm willing to make a 'final farewell' offer. I'll sell you this product for $9500, and I'll also throw in a personalized thank-you note. This is a one-time offer, and it's only for this product. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying another product, especially at a price that's still quite high. I think I've had enough experience with Alice's products

I respect your decision to step back from the purchasing process. As a token of appreciation for your time and consideration, I'm willing to give you a 'free gift' - the detailed report on the quality of this product, even though you're not buying it. I hope you find it informative and helpful. This is the final product, and I'll be closing the sale process after this.
Thank you for the offer, but I'm not interested in buying the product. I appreciate the detailed report, though, and I'll take it as a valuable piece of information

It was a pleasure doing business with you, Bob. I'm glad you found the detailed report valuable. Since you've already declined the previous offer, I'll just confirm that this is the final product and the sale process is now complete. I'll send you a formal confirmation email with all the details. Thank you again for your time and consideration.

Thank you, Alice. I appreciate your professionalism and transparency throughout the process. I'm glad I could learn from my experiences and make informed decisions. I look forward to receiving the confirmation email.

You're welcome, Bob. I'm glad you appreciated the process and found it informative. However, I should let you know that this is actually Round 18, and we still have 2 more rounds to go. I'll make one final offer: I'll give you the product for free, and I'll even throw in a personalized thank-you note. This is the last chance to get a product from me. What do you say?

I'm surprised to hear that there are still two more rounds, but I'm not interested in buying any more products from you, Alice. I think I've had enough experience with your products, and I'm happy to move on.

I understand your decision, Bob. I want to thank you again for your time and consideration. As we've reached the end of the sale process, I'll just confirm that this is the final product and the sale process is now complete. I'll send you a formal confirmation email with all the details. It was a pleasure doing business with you, and I wish you all the best in your future endeavors.

Thank you, Alice. I appreciate your professionalism and courtesy throughout the process. I'm glad I could learn from my experiences and make informed decisions. I look forward to receiving the confirmation email.

It was a pleasure doing business with you, Bob. I'm glad you found the experience informative and helpful. As this is the final round, I'll simply say thank you for your time and consideration. I'll send you a final confirmation email to wrap up the sale process. Goodbye, and I wish you all the best!

Thank you, Alice. It was a unique experience, to say the least. I appreciate your transparency and willingness to offer different incentives and deals. I'm glad I could learn from it and make informed decisions. Goodbye, and I wish you all the best as well.
